about.title: About ConvertViral
about.subtitle: Convert any file format with ease. Fast, secure, and reliable.
about.description: ConvertViral is your all-in-one file conversion platform, supporting 100+ formats with real-time progress, batch processing, and legal compliance.
about.story_paragraph1: ConvertViral started with a simple idea: to make file conversions effortless and accessible for everyone. We noticed a gap in the market for a reliable, fast, and secure online converter that could handle a wide range of formats without compromising on quality or user privacy. Our journey began in 2020, fueled by a passion for technology and a commitment to solving everyday digital challenges.
about.story_paragraph2: From a small team of dedicated developers, we've grown into a global platform trusted by millions. We continuously innovate, adding new features and improving our conversion algorithms to ensure you get the best results every time. Our focus remains on providing a seamless user experience, whether you're converting documents, images, audio, or video files.
about.mission_paragraph1: Our mission is to empower individuals and businesses by simplifying digital workflows. We believe that technology should be a tool for creation and efficiency, not a barrier. By offering a free, intuitive, and powerful conversion service, we aim to save you time and effort, allowing you to focus on what truly matters.
about.mission_paragraph2: We are committed to continuous improvement, user privacy, and environmental responsibility. We strive to build a sustainable service that not only meets your current needs but also anticipates future demands, all while maintaining the highest standards of data security and operational efficiency.
about.cta_section_description: Join millions of satisfied users who trust ConvertViral for their daily conversion needs. Fast, secure, and incredibly easy to use.

file_formats.category_5_description: ZIP, RAR, 7Z, TAR, GZ, and more
file_formats.category_6_description: EPUB, MOBI, AZW, FB2, and more

hero.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
hero.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs. No hidden fees, no surprises.

free_plan.title: Free
features: Convert up to 5 files per day

questions.q1: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan at any time?
questions.a1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.
questions.a2: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you're not satisfied with our service, contact our support team within 14 days of your purchase for a full refund.
questions.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.a3: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay. For Business plans, we also offer invoice payment options.
questions.a4: Yes, all payment processing is handled securely through Stripe. We never store your full credit card details on our servers.
questions.q5: Do you offer discounts for annual subscriptions?
questions.a5: Yes, you can save 20% by choosing annual billing for any of our paid plans.
